Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Arrow: I'll go.

Arrow took a trip outside and confronted the wasp bot.

Ar=
row: My name is Arrow. You are standing in front of the nWo Base. Unless yo=
u are interested in becoming an nWo-ite, I suggest you leave immediately.

=
The wasp: Okay, then, I'm interested. What're the stipulations?

Arrow: You=
 have to be loyal... Oh, and be black and white, but I see you already have=
 that color scheme.

The wasp: My name is highly classified, so--

Arrow: T=
here is NOTHING you need to hide from the New World Order, so you know. We'=
re not going to use your name against you.

The wasp: There are some things=
, yes. You can call me Wasp, and leave it at that.

Arrow: I'm okay with it=
, but I don't know about the others.

Wasp: I may have pursuers and enemies=
 and my name cannot be known. This new form and name should throw them off =
guard.

Arrow: Well, come in, then. Follow.

Arrow walks back towards the b=
ase. Wasp runs after him. Arrow pauses.

Arrow: Why don't you fly?

Wasp: I=
t's good exercise for my legs.

Arrow: Whatever works. Stand down, auto-gun=
s.

Arrow walks into the base, Wasp following. Deemos works on rearming the=
 system while Wasp looks around the room, heading tilting from side to side=
, up and down.

Arrow: Guys, this is Wasp. Not a real name, but it should d=
o. The fake name is for protection.

Deemos looks to Wasp and notes the bla=
ck and white color scheme. Deemos long ago donned the colors as part of his=
 own group, the Mafia, originally the Chosen Ones. It originally had consis=
ted of himself, Artist and Diskus, who had also by coincidence been a black=
 and white wasp. The group had grown rather large over time and eventually =
Deemos had thrown Diskus out of the group, but spared his life, unlike some=
 of his other members.

Deemos: You know, you look a lot like an old ally o=
f mine. Diskus was his name. You ever heard of him?

Wasp's head shakes, bu=
t Deemos still wonders...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: Richard A=
llen
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Friday, February 28, 2003 9:33 PM=

  Subject: Re: nWo/Strange signal ...


  : : Razor : : 

  Razor: I'll te=
ll you, when and if we know ourselves. Now, someone go talk to that bot out=
side. 

  The preceding has been paid for by the 

  New World Order 

   L=
urkerAbyss <1641coburn@...> wrote: 

    : : Hollywood : :

    Holl=
ywood barges into the room as Pheonix and Skyblaze disappear like that.  He=
 gets a weird look on his face.

    Hollywood:  What the......what's goin'=
 on?  What's going on around here brothers!?

    -------------------------=
------------------------

    Ne=
w World Order
